name: Tom Fairgrieve
content: Tom Fairgrieve Tom Fairgrieve Associate Professor, Teaching Stream Emeritus Dept. of Computer Science University of Toronto Toronto, Ontario CANADA Contact Information Mailing Address Email Department of Computer Science University of Toronto 40 St. George Street, Room 4283 Toronto, ON M5S 2E4 CANADA tff at cs.toronto.edu Research Interests Tom is a member of the Scientific Computing group. He is interested in algorithms for solving continuous mathematical problems that arise in the applied sciences and engineering. His research goals are the production of algorithms and software that are robust, efficient and accurate, the derivation of theorems that describe the behaviour of the algorithms, and the measurement of how well new mathematical software performs.
